summary: HORN HAS STOPPED WORKING, CHECK ENGINE LIGHT STAYS LIT, AIRBAG LIGHT KEEPS COMING ON AT LEAST ONCE A WEEK AND CHIMES.  DEALERSHIP BELIEVES FROM THE DESCRIPTION THAT IT MAY BE THE CLOCKSPRING EXCEPT THAT MY CRUISE CONTROL STILL WORKS.  VEHICLE FROM 1996-1998 HAS BEEN RECALLED FOR THE CLOCKSPRING. PLEASE BE ADVISED THAT THE SAME PROBLEMS THAT CAUSED THAT RECALL ARE SHOWING UP ON 1999 MODELS.
